explains: n. 野性；野蛮人；原始状态

sentences.en: The police were shocked by the savagery of the attacks.
sentences.cn: 警察对这些惨无人道的袭击感到震惊。

sentences.en: It was a clinical operation, but awesome in the scale of its savagery.
sentences.cn: 这是一个临床手术，但恐怖的是凶残到如此规模。

sentences.en: We have to understand that goodness must also be able to injure — to injure savagery.
sentences.cn: 我们必须明白，美德也有伤害的能力——它能伤害残忍。
